about.summary: Performs one-way tests in independent groups designs including homoscedastic and heteroscedastic tests. These are one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA), Welch's heteroscedastic F test, Welch's heteroscedastic F test with trimmed means and Winsorized variances, Brown-Forsythe test, Alexander-Govern test, James second order test, Kruskal-Wallis test, Scott-Smith test, Box F test and Johansen F test, Generalized tests equivalent to Parametric Bootstrap and Fiducial tests. The package performs pairwise comparisons and graphical approaches. Also, the package includes Student's t test, Welch's t test and Mann-Whitney U test for two samples. Moreover, it assesses variance homogeneity and normality of data in each group via tests and plots (Dag et al., 2018, <https://journal.r-project.org/archive/2018/RJ-2018-022/RJ-2018-022.pdf>).

Performs one-way tests in independent groups designs including homoscedastic and heteroscedastic tests. These are one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA), Welch's heteroscedastic F test, Welch's heteroscedastic F test with trimmed means and Winsorized variances, Brown-Forsythe test, Alexander-Govern test, James second order test, Kruskal-Wallis test, Scott-Smith test, Box F test and Johansen F test, Generalized tests equivalent to Parametric Bootstrap and Fiducial tests. The package performs pairwise comparisons and graphical approaches. Also, the package includes Student's t test, Welch's t test and Mann-Whitney U test for two samples. Moreover, it assesses variance homogeneity and normality of data in each group via tests and plots (Dag et al., 2018, <https://journal.r-project.org/archive/2018/RJ-2018-022/RJ-2018-022.pdf>).

name: r-onewaytests
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "3.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-onewaytests
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/onewaytests_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/onewaytests/onewaytests_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 42bb342112cee1a83d7f7a93d7de9538a601441caebdac97eb8caacab452d219

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-car
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-moments
    - r-nortest
    - r-wesanderson
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-car
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-moments
    - r-nortest
    - r-wesanderson

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('onewaytests')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('onewaytests')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=onewaytests
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Performs one-way tests in independent groups designs including homoscedastic and heteroscedastic tests. These are one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA), Welch's heteroscedastic F test, Welch's heteroscedastic F test with trimmed means and Winsorized variances, Brown-Forsythe test, Alexander-Govern test, James second
    order test, Kruskal-Wallis test, Scott-Smith test, Box F test and Johansen F test, Generalized tests equivalent to Parametric Bootstrap and Fiducial tests. The package performs pairwise comparisons and graphical approaches. Also, the package includes Student's t test, Welch's t test and Mann-Whitney U test for two samples.
    Moreover, it assesses variance homogeneity and normality of data in each group via tests and plots (Dag et al., 2018, <https://journal.r-project.org/archive/2018/RJ-2018-022/RJ-2018-022.pdf>).
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - izahn
